rows.label: tlk43300046_08_msg0001
rows.name:
While I was slaving to perfect my
Roast Meat Tagliata, things have gone
downhill out there in the world...

rows.label: tlk43300046_08_msg0003
rows.name:
I think I'd like to cook some food
for the refugees in Fons Maim, give
them at least a little bit of joy.

rows.label: tlk43300046_08_msg0004
rows.name:
Even though I only know how to
make Roast Meat Tagliata...

rows.label: tlk43300046_08_msg0005
rows.name:
Still, I can take pride
in it, so long as the food
serves a good purpose.

rows.label: tlk43300046_08_msg0006
rows.name:
It can be my way of serving Queen
Lagert for saving my hometown from
the flood all those years ago.
